entry.source: {F812}Voice\0The day will never come that {F843,0}{F801}looks upon the world he has saved.{F801}{F802}Which is why this is small comfort...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0The day will never come that {F843,0}{F801}looks upon the world he has saved.{F801}{F802}Which is why this is small comfort...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0Though it is not much, I shall show{F801}you the future of the world he chose.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0Though it is not much, I shall show{F801}you the future of the world he chose.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0In years to come, it will be known as{F801}a holy land.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0In years to come, it will be known as{F801}a holy land.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0And though he will not be present in{F801}person, he will live on there are a{F801}great hero.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0And though he will not be present in{F801}person, he will live on there are a{F801}great hero.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0So long as the people of this kingdom{F801}do not forget God...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0So long as the people of this kingdom{F801}do not forget God...{F801}

entry.source: このÍäñトはカットÁニメÍäñトになる{F801}想定ですが本Verでは実機Íäñトで表現します{F801}
entry.target: このÍäñトはカットÁニメÍäñトになる{F801}想定ですが本Verでは実機Íäñトで表現します{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Thus was a world created where all that{F801}is evil is ousted. The peace that the{F801}people know today shall last forever.{F801}{F802}〉 It is a world populated only with the{F801}innocent; the world God longed to see.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Thus was a world created where all that{F801}is evil is ousted. The peace that the{F801}people know today shall last forever.{F801}{F802}〉 It is a world populated only with the{F801}innocent; the world God longed to see.{F801}
